title: New Skin Idea
body:
I think we need a DunkMaster or a basketball themed skin for  {{champion:420}}  i feel like that would be cool and easily done 
replace her W and AA with a basketball, Q she slams down a basketball ring,  not sure about E and R can replace tentacles with basketball rings.
I've seen many times in games with an {{champion:420}}  against a {{champion:122}}  where the {{champion:420}}  will sat " I am the real dunkmaster" 
i just think it would be a cool skin
